Message:
This country that I live in is
conducting research on witches.

The professor specializes in
the field of cursed creatures,

but I know very little about
her work since she hasn’t once
talked about it around me.

I also never thought
to ask about it.

Instead, I did the housework
for the busy professor,

while also studying medicine
in hopes of maybe helping
with her research.

I was living every day to the
fullest, and that was good
enough for me.
